content: posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site some final words well done i hope you have had fun making this pattern feel free to block your work and use the square for whatever purpose you prefer if you make the pattern and would like to share pictures on social media please tag me with @krokoklint and the square with the hashtag #aprilblossomsquare i would love to see your version of the square lina
